history: Spain, Italy, Czechia, France, Slovenia, Cyprus, Greece, Serbia, the UK, and Switzerland are participating in the ELOQUENCE project.
What is Omilia's task in this project?

Omilia brings expertise on call-center automation and provides voice-enabled dialog systems to companies across North America, Canada, and Europe, assisting in the development of business and exploitation plans related to voice-enabled dialog systems.
